products.title: HPZ™ Bingo Multi-Functional Pet Travel Carrier Bag/Car Seat/Bed/Airline In-Cabin Compatible  (Sunrise Orange)
products.body_html:
HPZ Bingo pet carrier is a revolutionary carrier that redefines pet travel. It adapts to the various under-seat storage requirements set by different airlines while providing maximum comfort for your jet set pet. Worrying about buying a carrier that will not fit under a plane seat is a thing of the past. Straps on both sides allow you to secure it in your vehicle.

  • AIRLINE COMPLIANT - Airline Compliant and fit under seat. Soft cozy lining bedding with soft cushion so your pet can relax and rest in flight. The padding is detachable and machine-washable. 
  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made with water resistance and durable grade polyester, with support board to keep the carrier in shape. It works great for kittens, puppies and teacup breed under 20 pounds.
  • SAFETY IS IMPORTANT- Front and rear sides with large mesh panels for superb ventilation and equipped with harness to restrain the carrier with seat belt securely in vehicle.
  • EASY TO USE - You can use it as a tote carrier bag or shoulder carrier bag that be with a adjustable padded shoulder strap, carrying handle with extra padding for comfortable handling. Front, rear and side zipper openings for easy access to your pet.
  • INTEGRATED ORGANIZER - Large inner compartment to store pet treats, toys, leash, bowls and more! Comes with multiple functional pockets to stay flexible and organized.
  • CONVERT TO BED - Simply open the side cover and convert this carrier to a comfortable bed so your pet can take a nap just about anywhere, including cars, airplane, indoor, etc.
  • BUILT-IN BIKE ATTACHMENT - This carrier has harnesses to securely attach to bicycle or motorcycle.
  • PERFECT TRAVELING COMPANION - This premium carrier is ideal for everyday use for all of your essentials：conveniently carries food, treats, leashes, Frisbee, pet toys, grooming kit. Applicable occasions：traveling、hiking、outdoor activities、Go to the park.

Size: 21" x 11" x 11"  Weight: 3.7 Lbs

images.alt: HPZ™ Aaron Multi-Functional Pet Travel Carrier Bag/Car Seat/Bed/Airline In-Cabin Compatible - HPZ™ Pet Rover

products.title: Premium Pet Burial & Cremation Ceremony Kit - Casket for Small to Large Dogs and Cats
products.body_html:
Every pet deserves a Sweet Goodbye. Give your beloved pet a farewell full of love and This is a soft, beautifully designed, handmade, premium shroud with a thick, protective woolen layer. It keeps your cherished pets safe and snug so they can be securely transported for burial or cremation and laid with care in their final resting place. Our customers love this softer option compared with a hard box pet casket.

It is suitable for all breeds of dogs and large cats. It’s made from natural materials and a rainbow of attractive colors. Some pet owners choose to add this to existing bedding ahead of time, so it becomes familiar to all. Its strong, built-in 'cradle' makes lifting and carrying safe and easy, while keeping your pet secure and protected from the elements.

  • PREMIUM MADE IN USA – handmade in USA (with love) soft and colorful shroud with thick woolen layers to keep your beloved pet wrapped up safe and snug
  • ECO-FRIENDLY - made from wool, 100% cotton and other natural, bio-degradable materials
  • PERSONALIZED CEREMONY – create your own uniquely special memorial farewell ceremony, full of love and dignity
  • FOR CATS & DOGS – adjustable size to fit any small to large animal up to 60 Lbs.
  • ADJUSTABLE & EASY TRANSPORT– soft and flexible cozy coffin with room for your pet’s favorite small toy, includes built-in carrying cradle and strong handles for safe transport
  • Fits pet of length up to 31” and weight up to 50 pounds

products.title: HPZ™ Pet Stroller Organizer Bag (Black)
products.body_html:
A handy stroller accessory that helps you stay super organized while on the go. It is functionally designed to hold drinks and personal necessities to keep everything within easy reach. The accessory has two large drink holders and a large, easy-access interior pocket. It also has an additional flat pocket and a front zippered security pocket for storing valuables such as keys, a cell phone, a camera or a wallet. Velcro straps on each side of the tray easily and securely attach to stroller styles for convenience. It is made with high-density foam that provides rigidity. The pram accessory folds with all strollers and does not have any metal or plastic components that could crack or break. (Size: 15L x 9H x 3W-inches)

  • Pram accessory helps you stay super organized while on the go
  • Functionally designed stroller organizer for both drinks and personal necessities
  • Keeps everything within easy reach
  • Large easy-access interior pocket
  • Additional flat pocket and a front zippered security pocket for valuables such as keys, a cell phone, a camera or a wallet
  • Velcro straps on each side of the tray easily and securely attach to all stroller styles
  • High-density foam construction provides rigidity
  • Folds with all strollers
  • Does not have any metal or plastic components that could crack or break
  • Durable
  • Simply wipe clean

    •

products.title: Universal Rain/Wind/Dust Weatherproof Cover for Pet Rovers
products.body_html:
High quality materials provide great clarity and gloss, toughness and resistance to tearing. Large Velcro straps on the front, sides and rear of the cover provide a superior way to secure the cover to your pet stroller. Made with 100% EVA which is a non-toxic and eco-friendly material that does not produce a strong odor.

Roll-up front cover with zipper for easy access. Air vent holes on the sides for ventilation. Water/weather proof and durable. Protect your pets from rain, wind, dust and snow. Designed to fit all HPZ Pet Rover strollers.

Fits all HPZ Pet Rover and most other strollers.

products.body_html:
Protect your pet stroller when storing for an extended time or checking at the airplane gate. Travel-tested by hundreds of thousands of families around the world, it is compact and lightweight, making it convenient and easy to protect your gear from dust, dirt and germs. Made of durable denier polyester fabric and featuring double-stitched seams for strength. Equipped with 2 shoulder straps and front pocket.

NOTE: Wheels may need to be removed for large stroller, e.g. Pet Rover Titan HD/Run to use this bag.

Size: 45"L x 21"W (45"L x 32" L expanded)

products.title: HPZ™ Thermal Insulated Cup Holder with Mesh Pockets
products.body_html:
• Our Waterproof Thermal Insulated Bottle Holder includes a deep center insulated pocket for bottles, cups, and cans. Also includes two outer side mesh pockets that are great for keeping your cell phone and keys within easy reach.
  • Adjustable velcro strap designed to accommodate various handle angles which easily attach to most stroller handles. Can be folded together with stroller without breaking.
  • The cup holders are made of 900D oxford fabric, thick, durable; Inside the durable materials, there is 4mm PE form, which is good to keep coffee warm and beer cold longer; At the bottom, Aluminum lining inside with drain hole, easy to clean and wash.
  • Our Hot Or Cold Stroller Cup Holder is made of thick high quality material that will hold bottles of 16-32 OZ. Our Cup Holder is insulated so you can keep drinks hot or cold for a long time.

products.title: HPZ™ 4-in-1 Multi-Functions Convertible-Size Bolster Pad/ Bed/ Cuddler/ Carrier for Small/ Medium/ Large Dogs, Cats and Pets
products.body_html:
This ultra-soft pet pad/cuddler is convertible to fit small to large pets and is designed to fit our Pet Rover strollers which is perfect for travel use in colder weather. This variable-sized pad can also be converted to a cuddler. It is constructed from beautiful, plush synthetic fur and feature overstuffed polyester bolstered sides.

Cushioned poly-cotton base for added comfort and durability. Built for durability, beauty, and comfort, these multi-functional pet bed/cuddler is 100% machine washable.

Convertible size from 24Lx17W to 30Lx40W inches.

  • Grows with your pet. Easily converts from a cuddler to a full-size bed in seconds to accommodate any lifestyle.
  • The only dog bed in the market specially designed for pet strollers. Fits most strollers with thinner bottom leave enough room for your pet
  • When folded up it has no problem keeping your pet warm, once converted to a mat it’s perfect for a cool summer nap.
  • Light weight and travel friendly, easily folds up for transportation. Perfect for your pets’ favorite places like home, car, or their stroller.
  • Made of durable, premium and comfortable materials. Washes and dries easily so clean up is a breeze.
  • Pillow is not included.
  • Covered by life-time warranty.

products.title: Pet safety Clip-On Mini Fan (battery-powered)
products.body_html:
• KEEP YOUR PET COOL AND COMFY – This Stroller Fan is perfect for keeping your pets from overheating in the stroller on hot and humid days.
  • SAFETY COMES FIRST – The soft fins are safe to the touch, so even if your pet reaches for the fan, you don’t have to worry.
  • 360° FLEXIBLE NECK AND STURDY CLIP – Whether it's a stroller on the move, or home, it employs a flexible neck and stout clip, allowing the fan to keep your pet cool no matter the surface or angle.
  • BREEZE ON THE GO – It is lightweight, portable and easily fits in your bag of essentials, set the fan up alongside your pet to watch them cozily and comfortably nap away long summer days.
  • BATTERY POWERED - It is lightweight, portable and easily fits in your bag of essentials. Simply insert 2 AA batteries (not included), and set the fan up alongside your pet to watch them cozily and comfortably nap away long summer days.
  • Size: 8.27 x 4.53 x 2.56 inches

products.title: Waterproof Hair Resistant Blanket for Pet Strollers & Furniture - Large
products.body_html:
HPZ waterproof pet blanket is cozy and a great-looking option to protect your pet strollers, couch or bed from spills, stains, and pet fur. Premium waterproof fluffy soft sherpa pet blanket create the most comfortable bedding experience for you best friend, it’s also an incredibly soft blanket for you and your furry friend to snuggle with!

  • Waterproof: pet blanket can protect your furniture and make your pet feel comfortable while spending time with the family. The internal lining provides extra defense against damage and stains, effectively stopping liquids from seeping through and wetting the carpet.

  • Super Soft: The pet blanket is reversible for two different textures. Soft thick fleece on one side and plush sherpa backing on the other to keep your pets comfy, warm and dry. Each is super soft and cozy. Your pets will be comfortable to lie on it.

  • Multipurpose: In addition to indoor furniture, the waterproof thermal blanket can also be used as a car seat cover to protect the interior of your car from dirt, dander, and accidents, while providing your pup optimum snuggling comfort.

  • Superior Material: The double-side pet blanket is made of 220 GSM solid flannel, TPU water resistant lining and 220 GSM sherpa. Both materials are gentle on noses and paws for enhanced coziness.

  • Machine Washable: This blanket is easy to clean and care for. Simply machine wash cold and tumble dry low.

  • Size: 41 x 27.5 inches

products.title: Protector Pads with Adhesive Sticky Tape for Pet Strollers - 10 count
products.body_html:
Accidents happen. And when they do, it’s hard to clean up the mess and keep your pet stroller protected. Traditional pet pads just don’t cut it. They’re not absorbent enough so you’re left with a wet, leaky mess. Plus, they don’t block odors so your home still smells like pet accidents. Our 6-layer protection absorbs liquid quickly and blocks odors so you can relax and enjoy your pet parenthood experience.

  • 6 LAYER ABSORBENT: Large 35x24 inch Protector Pads with new Polymer Tech that instantly absorbs fast and turns liquid into gel, keeping floors, tiles, or carpets quickly dry
  • ADHESIVE STICKY TAPE: Best dog pads that prevent moving and leaving a huge mess in the pet stroller (sticky tape are optional; adhesive can be very sticky)
  • ODOR CONTROL: Protector pads for puppies, adult dogs, cats or any animal, eliminate and neutralize odors fast guarantee to keep your home smelling fresh and clean
  • BUILT-IN ATTRACTANT: Perfect for busy doggy owners or apartment pets, pheromones attractant puppy pads for housebreaking your doggie even if you're not home

products.title: Cooling Mat (Pressure Activated) for Pet Rover strollers
products.body_html:
• COOL AND COMFORTING - keeps your pet cool and comfy with pressure activated gel technology that absorbs body heat and delivers relief for pets from heat or joint pain
  • CONVENIENT AND MULTI-USE - Made of water-proof materials and easy to clean, folds up for easy storage; perfect for use indoors, outdoors, and on the go
  • INNOVATIVE DESIGN - features a lightweight, portable, and puncture resistant material that requires no electricity; no need to freeze or chill to maintain a cool surface
  • AUTOMATIC RECHARGEABLE COOLING PAD - allow air to cool and recharge the cooling mat when not in use
  • SAFE FOR PETS AND THE ENVIRONMENT - featuring a non-toxic gel that is safe for pets, adults, kids and the environment
  • Fits inside HPZ Pet Rover stroller. Measures 15 x 19 inches

HPZ pet carrier is a revolutionary carrier that redefines pet travel. It adapts to the various under-seat storage requirements set by different airlines while providing maximum comfort for your jet set pet. Worrying about buying a carrier that will not fit under a plane seat is a thing of the past. Straps on both sides allow you to secure it in your vehicle.

  • COMFORTABLE TRAVELING COMPANION-- Soft cozy lining bedding so your pet can relax and rest. Large bags contain soft cushions. It is compliant with most airlines
  • QUALITY CONSTRUCTION - Made with durable grade polyester. with a hard support board keep the carrier in a good shape. It works great for kittens, puppies and teacup breed

products.title: Convertible Pet Travel Carrier for all Seasons
products.body_html:
This pet bag can be used for two purposes. When the weather is hot, you can fold the cloth to the bottom to achieve a breathable and cool effect. The little cute feet can also be stretched out freely. When you are tired of carrying the bag, you can take the little cute for a walk. When it is cold in winter, you can cover it with cloth to keep warm.

This bag is designed by HPZ, manufactured and designed in the United States, and carefully handmade Boost your pet's adventure with this multifunctional bag! Use it as a breathable bed for your furry friend in hot weather, and when you're ready to hit the trails, simply fold and clip it onto your dog's back as a lightweight carrier. Who says you can't have it all?

With this bag, you and your pet can go anywhere and do anything in style! Unleash your pet's inner explorer with this versatile and bold pet bag from HPZ! Whether it's for hot summer days or chilly winter adventures, this bag has got you covered. Transform it into a comfy bed for your furry companion to cool off during heatwaves, or easily clip it onto their back for a lightweight carrier while on the move. Don't settle for mediocre pet travel gear - go for this bag and conquer the great outdoors in style!

products.title: HPZ™ Side Sling Stroller Cargo Net
products.body_html:
The Side Sling Stroller Cargo Net adds needed storage space to strollers. This multi-functional design can be used on either side of the stroller or one on each side.

The Side Sling will fold with most strollers and features a wide elastic opening for easy access to on-the-go necessities and personal items. The Side Sling attaches to stroller side bars with 2 non-slip adjustable straps. Its contoured design blends with the stroller frame for stylish stroller accessorizing.

Attaching on the side of the stroller keeps cargo weight safely distributed to avoid tipping. A must-have for every stroller!

products.title: Foldable Pet Stairs for Pet Strollers
products.body_html:
• Great for Pets to access strollers: Each of the 3 steps helps your pets get on a pet stroller, high bed, sofa, and vehicles safely; ideal for pets with mobility issues to climb up to their favorite stroller effortlessly
  • Sturdy Pets Ladder: The firmly attached platform fits right on the step; it will stay in place when your pets run up and down; the detachable bottom pads are placed inside the stairs to make sure the pets ladder is stable enough without any wobbling
  • Cozy Condo and Extra Storage: Perfectly combined the functionality and innovative design; the underneath condo with a soft cushion builds a comfortable resting place for your lovely pets; these two practical compartments can store your dog's favorite toys and snacks
  • Durability and Safety: Constructed from a solid structural frame and covered with wear-resistant fabric, the stair stepper supports up to 45lbs / 20kg and is durable enough to last for years; the non-slip mat protects your pet's paws and prevents your pet from slipping while climbing
  • Excellent Solution for Small and Injured Pets: Each of the 3 steps helps your pets get on a high bed, sofa, and vehicles safely; ideal for small and aging pets or pets with mobility issues to climb up to their favorite spot without getting injured
  • Simply Assemble & Foldable: People of all ages can complete the pet stairs alone in a few minutes, even without instructions; these dog steps can be folded conveniently for transport and easily stored under a piece of furniture

Size: 13"x5"

products.title: 3-in-1 Car Booster Seat, Carrier & Pillow Bed for Small & Medium Pets
products.body_html:
• Protective Pillows at Front and Rear: Crafted to buffer your fur baby when it jolts about, one side of the cushion can be easily folded in two.
  • Effortless Mobility: With a tough handle for a simple transition of the car seat, you can easily hang the collar and secure it on the car seat's hooks.
  • Scratch & Water Resistant: Create a durable and impermeable space for your pet with scratch-resistant fabric to protect against sharp canine claws.
  • Detachable Covers & Pillows: Effortlessly detach the covers and pillows with a simple unzipping motion to remove the plush cotton interior.
  • High-quality Adjustable Leashes: This luxurious dog car seat features two adjustable collars, each fitted with a high-quality, heavy-duty nickel plated swivel snap hook crafted from the finest materials.
  • Convenient Compartments: Discretely tucked away on both sides of the car seat, you'll find pockets for creating an organized abode for snacks, collars, toys, and more.
  • Size: 20x20x15 inches, 3 Lbs.

products.title: Multiple Poop Bags Holder with Dispenser
products.body_html:
• STOP CARRYING POOP WITH YOUR HANDS: Wide, easy to open pouch allows you to discretely store full poop bags until you are able to find the next trash can.
  • NO MORE STINK: Odor blocking activated carbon lining along with air-tight water resistant zippers keep the smell at bay.
  • CARRY SEVERAL LOADS: Oversized 8" x 8" pouch allows you to carry 3 large poops or several smaller poops. It works great for carrying treats too!
  • EASY TO CLEAN: A pull out waterproof lining makes it a breeze to clean. Water resistant shell makes cleaning super simple and ready for your next adventure.
  • COMFORTABLE FIT: Adjustable 48" waist belt and convenient waste bag compartment make this pouch a must have on all of your doggy adventures.

products.title: 4-in-1 Water, Food, Shovel and Waste Bags Dispenser  - Yellow
products.body_html:
• All in 1 Multi-function: This 500mL/17oz. portable dog travel water bottle has 4 functions for water, food, shovel and garbage bag. 
  • Intimate Design: Unlike ordinary dog travel bottles, ours not only has a large O-shaped drinking trough and food storage that can satisfy all size of dogs, but also adds poop collection shovel and garbage bag storage. 
  • Easy to Use & Leak-proof: One-key lock/open design, you can operate this dog water bottle with one hand. The sealed silicone gasket and lock in the bottle cap can ensure that water does not leak from the bottle, no need to worry about getting the travel bag wet.
  • Safe and Convenient: The portable dog water bottle is made of premium food-grade silicone and PC materials, lead-free, BPA-free, safe and durable, no harm for pet's health.
  • Suit for All Needs: This dog travel water bottle will make your travel, hiking, walking, picnic become a more perfect journey. Comes with a light weight lanyard which is convenient enough to carry around.

products.title: Water and Food Dispenser  - Blue
products.body_html:
• This set includes one water and food container. With this set, your furry friend will never go thirsty or hungry on the go.
  • The portable dog water dispenser has two chambers, one for food and the other for water. The isolation net prevents pouring food into both sides. The dog water bottle can store about 250g/9oz of food and 350g/12oz of water.
  • The dog water dispenser is made with high-quality food-grade materials, which are durable and reusable. 
  • Our dog water bottle is designed with a sealed silicone pad on the cup cover, fastened by four buttons. The grain outlet and water outlet covers are tightly fastened to the cup wall, ensuring that the water and food stay clean and preventing any spills.

products.title: Vehicle Seat Belt Safety Leash Harness
products.body_html:
• SIMPLE TO USE 3-IN-1 CONNECTION - Our car dog harness comes equipped with 2 different easy to use connectors; a buckle for connecting to the car seatbelt buckle receiver, and a hook latch that hooks onto the child safety car seat hook or trunk of your car. It lets you choose the most convenient connection, and simple 2-step operation makes it easy to use too, simply clip it to your dog and latch it to the car.
  • COMFORTABLE SEATBELT - Our dog seatbelt harness is designed to keep your furry friend restrained whenever you need to bring him for a drive. It is a comfortable and tangle-proof leash that attaches to your dog’s harness via a 360° rotation carabiner hook. It allows dogs to move freely in the backseat without feeling rigidly restricted.
  • ENHANCED SAFETY - Unlike other dog car harnesses that are inelastic and unbuffered subjecting your dog to sudden pulls and jerks, our dog seatbelt features an elastic section that protects pets in times of sudden braking or sharp maneuvers. The carabiner hook also features a lock for increased safety for your dog.
  • PERFECT FOR ALL DOG SIZES - Apart from the additional elastic buffer, this is a fully adjustable strap leash that can be extended to suit different dog sizes, it can extend from 23-31 Inches making it superbly suitable for extra-large pets too. It can also double up as a convenient leash that you can use whenever you and your dog need a quick roadside break.
  • UNMATCHED DURABILITY - We designed this seat belt for dogs for toughness and durability. It is made from a high-quality sturdy nylon fabric that’s resistant to dog bites, and features zinc alloy clips and buckle that are super strong and rust-resistant. You are guaranteed a long-lasting dog seat belt that is worth every dime. Add to Cart now and give your dog better safety and comfort.

products.title: Airline Approved Pet Travel Organizer/Lunch Bag with Food Containers & Bowls
products.body_html:

It meets the carry-on requirements of some airlines, with multiple carry-on options, and can be hand-carried, crossbody or fixed again on the luggage trolley.

  • HIGH QUALITY MATERIALS: 2 removable internal dividers, which can be freely separated from the internal space or placed at the bottom to strengthen the weight-bearing. The pet travel set is made of polyester material, which is tear-resistant, wear-resistant and excellent waterproof, and can accommodate multiple types of food. The front pocket can be used as a food pad or put some pet supplies.
  • EASY TO USE & PORTABLE: Wide adjustable shoulder straps help to reduce the burden on your shoulders, the straps and handles are sewn to withstand 15Lbs., making it the best choice for travel, hiking and outdoor activities. It can be folded and put away when not in use to save space.

products.body_html: Four collapsible bowls hold up to 12 fluid ounces of water or 1.5 cups of pet food. Only 1/2 inches when collapsed - simply pop-up and then fold away. Made with high quality flexible food-grade silicone, 100% lead­ free and BPA­ free. The bowl's durable silicone construction can be rinsed or wiped clean after each use. Non-Slip collapsible pet bowls set includes color-matching carabiners for attaching to Pet Rover strollers or anywhere you like.

products.title: Dog Acl Knee Brace for Medium Dogs
products.body_html:
• DOG KNEE BRACE: Dog acl brace provides effective support for your dog's knee. Dog knee brace for hind leg is designed for dogs with cruciate ligament injuries, patellar luxation, arthritis and kneecap problems to help relieve pain and give dogs a healthy and happy life.
  • EFFECTIVE SUPPORT: Dog acl knee brace wraps 360° around the dog's leg and applies light pressure, helping to relieve the loss of stability due to injury and improving balance between muscle groups. Dog knee brace for luxating patella provides enough support to avoid more serious conditions due to re-injury. Dog leg brace prevents the dog from licking and chewing and helps the wound to heal.
  • PAIN RELIEF AND HELP RECOVERY: Dog knee braces for back leg wrap around and warm the joints to help relieve pain from joint pain and inflammation, aid recovery and improve mobility and prevent muscle atrophy. Dog acl brace are also suitable for dogs recovering from surgery and are ideal for recovering from injuries.
  • HINGED DDESIGN : Dog acl knee brace has a movable metal hinge on the outside of the knee that adjusts to the changing shape of the dog's leg during exercise, providing flexibility and maximum support to speed up recovery.The hinge of dogleg brace provides strong support for the dog's leg.
  • EASY TO PUT ON : The upgraded dog knee brace is easy to put on with fewer steps to put it on. Dog leg braces for back leg has a sternum strap and adjustable attachment straps that fit the dog's body shape, making it difficult to slip off the pet for better protection. Dog acl brace is made from high quality fabric that is soft and flexible, lightweight and durable, preventing unnecessary skin rubbing.

products.title: Travel-size Stain & Odor Eliminator for Pet Strollers 8oz (2 pack)
products.body_html:
Accidents happen. After all, dogs are only canine. In the case of pet urine and other tough stains and odors, HPZ Eliminator is the one to reach for. Its professional-strength bio-enzymatic formula goes to work at once, releasing active enzymes that feed on ammonia residue left behind in pet urine and other organic materials. So not only does it get out the stain, it eliminates the odor deep down within the pet stroller at its source-which discourages re-soiling. The result: Stains and odors are completely eliminated, leaving surfaces fresh. Of course, it works on much more than pet urine: any organic stain-vomit, poop, all the gross stuff, whether human or animal-lifts out of the pet strollers easily and completely. 8oz travel bottle.
  • CERTIFIED GENTLE AND SAFE - Chlorine free and color safe. Safe to use around pets and children. No hazardous propellants, no residue left behind. So gentle it’s been Certified Safe for all pet strollers fabrics, earning the Seal of Approval by the trusted Carpet and Rug Institute (CRI)
  • ELIMINATES STAINS, ODORS AND RESIDUE - If it’s gross, it’s gone. Not just the stain, but the stink. From stinky yellow pet urine and feces to vomit and other organic spills, our professional strength formula tackles them all.
  • EVERY SURFACE, EVERY TIME - For use on pet strollers, carpets, floors, furniture, clothing, kennels, carriers, all pet living and sleeping areas—anywhere stains happen.
  • ENZYME ACTIVATED - The key is getting to the problem deep-down. This spray contains natural enzymes that are activated on contact with odors and stains, feeding on ammonia crystals and organic matter until they are completely eliminated.

DIRECTIONS: Pre-test for colorfastness on a hidden area. if color appears, discontinue use. Remove as much of the stain or pet urine as possible using a highly absorbent towel.

1. Apply a liberal amount of Stain & Odor Eliminator to the affected area.

2. Let stand 30-60 minutes, then blot with a cloth and let air dry.

products.title: Indoor Pet Bed Electric Warmer
products.body_html:
This Pet Bed Warmer utilizes internal dual thermostats that regulate temperature using an energy efficient 6 watts only. The surface of your pet’s bed will warm to their approximate natural body temperature when they lie on it, allowing them to rest comfortably and snuggly warm. When not in use the surface will cool to approximately 10-15 degrees above ambient air temperature.

This Pet Bed Warmer is not 'pressure activated', it will emit a small amount of heat anytime it is plugged in and inserted into a pet bed. This is to allow your pet to sense the heat being produced by the Pet Bed Warmer, and that heat will draw your pet to the bed. Your pet will love it so much it will quickly become their favorite place to nap.

  • Pet bed warmer for virtually any indoor pet bed
  • The Pet Bed Warmer will warm the surface of a pet bed about 10-15 degrees above ambient air temperature when inserted inside a pet bed.
  • The surface of the bed will rise to about 102 degrees only when the pet is in the bed.
  • Recommended for year-round indoor use; plugs in to any household outlet
  • Measures 9-1/2 by 8-1/2 inches; limited 1-year warranty. MET certified.
